name: Delicious Thing
content: This thing truly was delicious; let it be known.

name: Vile Thing
content: This subsequent thing however, was the vilest of things.

name: Delectable Thing
content: This other thing was, indeed, the most delectable of things.

name: Dejectable Thing
content: This other thing was, indeed, the most dejectable of things.

name: Defamatory Thing
content: This other thing was, indeed, the most defamatory of things.

name: Domestic Thing
content: This other thing was, indeed, the most domestic of things.
